channel.title: Comments on: PuddleDucks Customers Given a Louder Voice

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: Thanks Jonathan, it's been a joy working with Puddleducks. They really know what they are doing.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Jonathan, it’s been a joy working with Puddleducks. They really know what they are doing.

item.title: By: Jonathan Hill
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Hill
item.description: This is a great piece of synergy - well done to all involved.
item.content:encoded: This is a great piece of synergy – well done to all involved.
